[COMPONENTS]

left_generators : 2 
right_generators : 2
auxiliary_generators : 1
left_ac_buses : 2
right_ac_buses : 2
left_rectifiers : 2
right_rectifiers : 2
left_dc_buses : 2
right_dc_buses : 2
left_loads : 2
right_loads : 2

[DIRECT CONNECTIONS]
left_ac_buses -> left_rectifiers
right_ac_buses -> right_rectifiers
left_rectifiers -> left_dc_buses
right_rectifiers -> right_dc_buses
left_dc_buses -> right_dc_buses
right_dc_buses -> left_dc_buses
dc_buses -> loads
